item.title: Help changing exp rate [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“ravekitty, post:2, topic:444844”]Try looking in woodcutting.java
and
mining.java[/quote]
Why would it be in there?

Anyways, @ OP
Figure out what xp rate it is at, i.e. chop a willow. the formula is ###/90=
Then in the search bar search the answer and look in relevant files.

Read full topic

item.title: Help changing exp rate [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hey guys, I need to change the woodcutting and mining exp rate on my server because it takes soo long to level up. In my config.java I found this.

public static final int WOODCUTTING_EXPERIENCE = 300; public static final int MINING_EXPERIENCE = 400; public static final int SMITHING_EXPERIENCE = 80; public static final int FARMING_EXPERIENCE = 80; public static final int FIREMAKING_EXPERIENCE = 20; public static final int HERBLORE_EXPERIENCE = 80; public static final int FISHING_EXPERIENCE = 120; public static final int AGILITY_EXPERIENCE = 80; public static final int PRAYER_EXPERIENCE = 80; public static final int RUNECRAFTING_EXPERIENCE = 80; public static final int CRAFTING_EXPERIENCE = 80; public static final int THIEVING_EXPERIENCE = 80; public static final int SLAYER_EXPERIENCE = 65; public static final int COOKING_EXPERIENCE = 80; public static final int FLETCHING_EXPERIENCE = 80; }

And changed the woodcutting from 150 to 300 and the mining from 150 to 400, I saved and compiled but you still get the same amount of exp, can anyone help me :(.

Read full topic
